## âš”ï¸ Refutation Argument

### 1. Logical Contradiction (if applicable)

> Identify logical conflicts between target axiom and other axioms within the model

```
Axiom X states: ...
Axiom Y states: ...
These two axioms contradict because: ...
```

### 2. Derivation Error (if applicable)

> Identify logical gaps within the reasoning chain from premises to conclusion

```
Premise 1: ...
Premise 2: ...
Claimed Conclusion: ...
Error in Step N: ...
```

### 3. Empirical Falsification (if applicable)

> Identify conflicts with established scientific facts or reproducible experiments
